abstract: Humberto Leon and Carol Lim presented their first Kenzo collection Sunday evening with a show that was every bit as fun as promised by the two founders of Opening Ceremony.
snippet: Humberto Leon and Carol Lim presented their first Kenzo collection Sunday evening with a show that was every bit as fun as promised by the two founders of Opening Ceremony.
lead_paragraph: PARIS - Humberto Leon and Carol Lim presented their first Kenzo collection on Sunday with a show that was every bit as fun as promised by the two founders of Opening Ceremony.
